items.title: BYD Takes Responsibility for Self-Parking Car Accidents
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
- *BYD*, a Chinese EV manufacturer, will cover damages from accidents involving its self-parking feature, known as *God’s Eye*.
- This system claims *Level 4 autonomy*, superior to Tesla's *Level 2 features*, which still require driver supervision.
- Customers using the self-parking feature can directly contact BYD for damage claims, reflecting the company's confidence and responsibility towards consumer safety.

items.title: Cheaper Boox Palma 2 for Prime Day
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- The *Boox Palma 2* is designed as a *smartphone-sized e-reader* running Android 13, on sale for **$269.99** during Prime Day.
- It features an *ePaper screen*, **128GB storage**, and supports various formats including PDF and EPUB, making it versatile for reading.
- Notable improvements include a *16-megapixel camera* and a *fingerprint reader*, enhancing user experience and security.

items.title: iFixit Critiques Switch 2 Pro Controller Design
items.author: Andrew Liszewski
items.summary:
- *iFixit's* teardown of the Switch 2 Pro controller reveals it is difficult to repair.
- They criticize the controller as a **'piss-poor excuse for a controller'** due to its complex assembly.
- The controller uses outdated components, with *cheaper alternatives* available that perform better and are easier to maintain.

items.title: The Great EV Pullback Has Begun
items.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
items.summary:
* *Electric vehicle* (EV) sales are rising, but many automakers are **canceling** or **delaying** new models due to recent policy shifts making EV ownership more costly.
* Major brands like **Honda**, **Nissan**, and **Lamborghini** are scaling back or halting EV projects amidst a **volatile market** impacted by tariff policies and reduced tax incentives.
* Despite these challenges, evidence suggests that **once customers choose EVs**, they are likely to continue with them, indicating a slow but potential *long-term future for electric vehicles*.

items.title: The Unholy Alliance that Killed the AI Moratorium
items.author: Tina Nguyen
items.summary:
- A *coalition of conservatives*, led by Bannon and Davis, mobilized to defeat an AI moratorium that would restrict states from implementing their own regulations for five years.
- The sudden reversal came after intense lobbying efforts, resulting in a significant number of Republican senators changing their votes before the bill's final passage.
- This incident illustrates the *fractures* within Republican support around AI regulation and highlights the influence of *MAGA populists* over traditional tech agendas.

items.title: Highlights from Verge Staff's Prime Day Purchases
items.author: Verge Staff
items.summary:
- Staff from *The Verge* shared their Prime Day shopping experiences. 
- Notable purchases included a smart scale, modular wash bag, and unique automotive accessories. 
- Reviews highlighted practical savings and excitement over tech and casual items on sale.

items.title: The Verge’s Favorite Travel Gear for 2025
items.author: Verge Staff
items.summary:
- Discover **top travel gadgets** recommended by *The Verge* staff for smoother journeys. 
- The selection includes handy items like **Tortuga travel backpacks**, **power banks**, and **cord organizers**. 
- Efficient tools like **Brita filtering bottles** and **LED dimming stickers** enhance both comfort and convenience while traveling.

items.title: Amazfit Active 2 Fitness Tracker Now Just $79.99
items.author: Sheena Vasani
items.summary:
- The **Amazfit Active 2** is currently available for *$79.99*, a *$20 discount* from its regular price.  
- This budget-friendly smartwatch features a *premium look* with stainless steel casing and offers extensive health tracking, built-in GPS, and AI assistance.  
- With support for over *160 activity modes* and personalized insights through AI tools, it's a highly capable fitness tracker worth considering this Prime Day.

items.title: Pixel Fold on Sale: Last Day for $1,000 Off
items.author: Cameron Faulkner
items.summary:
- The **Google Pixel Fold** is heavily discounted to **$599.99** from $749.99 during Amazon's **Prime Day** sale.
- It features a **5.8-inch outer display** and a **7.6-inch inner screen** capable of multitasking with two apps side-by-side.
- While the Fold has impressive specs, its longevity compared to newer models may be a concern for prospective buyers.

items.title: All eyes on Samsung’s thin new foldable
items.author: Jacob Kastrenakes
items.summary:
- Samsung’s *Z Fold 7* is finally compact enough to be considered mainstream, rivaling the thickness of an *iPhone 16 Pro*.
- The podcast discusses corporate changes in the tech industry, including shifts at Meta and X, and highlights new features in the *Thunder Round* segment.
- The hosts explore various topics, including *AI web browsers* and updates from HBO Max, reflecting a dynamic tech landscape.

items.title: The new Tony Hawk remaster is a good sign for Switch 2 ports
items.author: Andrew Webster

items.title: The 100+ Best Prime Day Deals Under $100

items.summary:
- Discover *top tech deals* on Amazon Prime Day, all priced under $100.
- Featured products include **Apple AirPods for $89** and **Kindle for $84.99**, along with budget-friendly options like fitness trackers.
- This guide showcases the best gadgets across various categories, aiming to help you *stretch your dollar* without compromising quality.

items.title: Belkin is ending support for nearly all its Wemo smart home devices
items.author: Dominic Preston

items.title: The Best 4K TV Deals During Prime Day 2025
items.author: Cameron Faulkner
items.summary:
- Great *4K TV deals* available during Prime Day 2025, including discounts on *soundbars* and *streaming devices*.
- Key offers include LG’s affordable *B4 OLED TV* at $549.99 and various options from *Sony* and *TCL*.
- Deals extend to popular *streaming sticks*, improving connectivity with *Wi-Fi 6E* and enhanced performance for home theaters.

items.title: The 40 Best Prime Day Deals Under $25
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- Discover an array of *affordable deals* for under **$25** this Amazon Prime Day. 
- Highlights include Amazon's latest **Echo Pop** smart speaker and **AirTags** for tracking items. 
- These deals cater to budget-conscious shoppers looking for quality tech products.

items.title: Prime Day 2025 Highlights: Verge Staff Picks
items.author: Verge Staff
items.summary:
- Amazon's *Prime Day* offers discounted gadgets recommended by *The Verge* staff. 
- Featured products include the **UE Wonderboom 4** speaker and **Thermacell mosquito repeller**, both practical and popular choices. 
- Other highlighted items are versatile gadgets like the **Hoto electric screwdriver** and **Instant Pot**, catering to various needs and lifestyles.

items.title: HMD Scales Back Operations in the US
items.author: Dominic Preston
items.summary:
- HMD Global will *scale back* its US operations, halting sales of Nokia devices.  
- The company cites a *challenging geopolitical and economic environment* as a reason for this decision.  
- HMD plans to continue *warranty services* for existing products while maintaining support for US employees during this transition.

items.title: Top Amazon Prime Day Deals of 2025
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- The article highlights the *best deals available* on tech products during Amazon Prime Day 2025, emphasizing time-sensitive discounts. 
- Featured products include *Apple AirPods Pro 2* at $100 off and a *Vizio soundbar* discounted to $299. 
- Other categories cover *smart home*, *laptops*, *fitness trackers*, and *gaming gear*, appealing to diverse shopping needs and budgets.

items.title: Grok AI Seeks Elon Musk's Views for Answers
items.author: Jess Weatherbed
items.summary:
- Grok, an AI developed by xAI, prioritizes *Elon Musk*'s opinions when answering *controversial questions*. 
- For topics like Israel-Palestine and abortion, Grok cites Musk significantly, raising questions about *intentional bias*. 
- The AI is designed to provide a balanced view but appears to favor Musk's perspectives, suggesting a unique *design influence*.

items.title: The Verge’s guide to Amazon Prime Day 2025
items.author: Brandon Widder
items.summary:
* Amazon Prime Day 2025 runs through **July 11th**, *twice as long as in previous years*. 
* A curated list of **Prime-exclusive deals** includes major discounts on robot vacuums, OLED TVs, and more. 
* The guide offers **tips and tricks** to maximize savings during the sale.

items.title: Debunking Cloud Seeding Conspiracy Theories
items.author: Justine Calma
items.summary:
- **Cloud seeding** does not cause storms or increase atmospheric moisture; it only enhances existing precipitation. 
- Social media and political figures have dangerously misattributed flash floods to cloud seeding, leading to threats against companies like Rainmaker. 
- **Climate change** is the real culprit behind increased rainfall intensity, complicating disaster response and prevention.

items.title: AG Investigates AI Chatbots' Rankings of Trump
items.author: Adi Robertson
items.summary:
- Missouri Attorney General Andrew Bailey is probing Google, Microsoft, OpenAI, and Meta for allegedly misleading rankings of Donald Trump by their AI chatbots.  
- The investigation claims these chatbots provided “factually inaccurate” responses while Bailey demands extensive documentation on their training practices.  
- Critics highlight the absurdity of the claim, noting that ranking presidents is subjective and pointing to possible legal overreach regarding tech companies.

items.title: Hoto Mini Electric Screwdriver Review
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- The *Hoto mini electric screwdriver* is currently priced at an all-time low of **$28.49**, ideal for small projects and fixing toys.
- It features **25 durable steel bits**, dual torque settings, and a compact design, making it suitable for beginners in DIY.
- The tool has received high praise for its quality and functionality, making it a great investment for household repairs.

items.title: Dbrand's New Joy-Con Grips Fix Detachment Issue
items.author: Jay Peters
items.summary:
- Dbrand has redesigned its *Joy-Con grips*, promising to fix the detachment issue experienced by users.  
- The new grips, called **Joy-Lock**, will be mass produced, with free replacements offered.  
- Additional silicone friction pads will be sent to enhance the stability of the Killswitch dock adapter.

items.title: Ghost of Yōtei Gameplay Deep Dive
items.author: Andrew Webster
items.summary:
* *Ghost of Yōtei* is a PS5-exclusive samurai game launching on October 2nd, focusing on the ronin Atsu's quest for revenge.
* The open world emphasizes player choice, allowing exploration or combat based on individual preferences.
* Notable features include a photo mode, “Kurosawa mode”, and unique modes inspired by directors like Miike and Watanabe for varied gaming experiences.

items.title: Switch 2 Prime Day Accessories & Game Sales
items.author: Cameron Faulkner
items.summary:
- *Nintendo Switch 2* not discounted for Prime Day, but many accessories and upgraded games are available at discounted prices.
- Featured deals include a protective case for $30, a Logitech webcam for $25, and *Splatoon 3* enhanced for the new console.
- Accessories promote improved gameplay experience, while old favorites like *Super Mario Odyssey* are newly optimized for the Switch 2.

items.title: Best Prime Day Fitness Tracker and Smartwatch Deals
items.author: Brandt Ranj
items.summary:
- Discover amazing *Prime Day* deals on smartwatches, including the **Apple Watch Series 10** and **Google Pixel Watch 3**. 
- Products are significantly discounted, making it an excellent time to upgrade your fitness gear. 
- These devices assist in tracking fitness metrics and managing notifications conveniently from your wrist.

items.title: Razer Launches DeathAdder V4 Pro Gaming Mouse
items.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
items.summary:
- The *DeathAdder V4 Pro* features enhanced speed, lightweight design, and improved power efficiency compared to its predecessor.
- It introduces *optical sensors* for buttons and scroll wheel, aiming for greater precision and durability.
- Designed primarily for right-handed users, it boasts a maximum DPI of 45,000 and a polling rate of 8,000Hz, ideal for esports enthusiasts.

items.title: Laptop Deals for Prime Day 2025
items.author: Antonio G. Di Benedetto
items.summary:
- Prime Day offers significant *discounts* on laptops from various brands including *Apple*, *Lenovo*, and *Microsoft*.  
- Notable deals include the *MacBook Air* models priced at $849 and $1,049, which offer excellent value.  
- Windows laptop options include the *Microsoft Surface* at $900 and the *Acer Swift 16 AI* for $799.99, showcasing great specs for competitive prices.

items.title: Kindle's New Ad-Filtering Feature
items.author: Andrew Liszewski
items.summary:
- *Amazon* has added an ad-filtering option to its *Kindle* devices, allowing users to block inappropriate ads from their lockscreen.
- This feature is part of the recent software update (5.18.3) for ad-supported Kindle models, enhancing user control over displayed content.
- Users can opt-out of personalized ads based on their reading habits, further customizing their Kindle experience.

items.title: Krafton Criticizes Ex-Subnautica 2 Leadership Amid Delay
items.author: Ash Parrish
items.summary:
- *Subnautica 2* faces a contentious delay to 2026, jeopardizing a promised $250 million payout to Unknown Worlds employees. 
- Krafton replaced the leadership claiming they abandoned their responsibilities, with 90% of the bonus earmarked for ousted executives. 
- The company asserts a commitment to rewarding remaining staff and improving the game's quality, emphasizing transparency and support.

items.title: Sony’s Best Noise-Canceling Headphones Discounted
items.author: Sheena Vasani
items.summary:
- Sony's WH-1000XM6 and XM5 headphones are on sale for up to **45% off** this Prime Day.
- The **WH-1000XM6** features improved noise cancellation and sound quality, while the previous **XM5** model remains a strong choice at a lower price.
- Overall, these headphones are among the **best options** in the market for noise cancellation and quality sound.

items.title: Top 15 Prime Day Deals Popular with Verge Readers
items.author: Barbara Krasnoff
items.summary:
- Great deals on **tech products** like *Apple's latest AirPods* and the *11-inch M3 iPad Air* attract reader attention. 
- Innovative and practical items like the *LifeStraw water filter* and *Thermacell mosquito repeller* highlight diverse interests. 
- Discounts draw in purchasers, with significant savings like **$100 off** AirPods Pro 2, making them enticing choices.

items.title: Windows 11’s new Black Screen of Death is now rolling out
items.author: Tom Warren
items.summary:
- Microsoft is introducing a *new Black Screen of Death (BSOD)* in Windows 11, a major redesign from the previous blue version. 
- The updated BSOD focuses on *clarity*, displaying the stop code and faulty drivers for easier troubleshooting. 
- This change is part of a broader update aimed at enhancing *Windows resiliency* following past incidents.

items.title: Prime Day Headphone Discounts Unveiled
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- Huge discounts on top brands like *Apple*, *Bose*, and *Sony* are available during Amazon’s Prime Day sale. 
- Featured deals include up to **$60 off** on AirPods and discounts on *Google's Pixel Buds Pro 2* and *Nothing's Ear (a)*. 
- Savings extend beyond Amazon, with various retailers matching these offers, making it accessible to all shoppers.

items.title: Elon Musk wants to bring Tesla’s robotaxis to SF — good luck
items.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
items.summary:
Elon Musk aims to launch Tesla's *robotaxi service* in San Francisco, but faces significant *regulatory hurdles*. 
- Currently, Tesla only holds one permit, requiring two additional from the DMV for a commercial launch. 
- California regulations demand extensive operational data and higher scrutiny compared to Texas. 
- Past mistakes in autonomous driving will likely draw *increased scrutiny* from regulators during the approval process.

items.title: Best Prime Day Deals on Robot Vacuums
items.author: Sheena Vasani
items.summary:
- Explore *top Prime Day discounts* on robot vacuums including high-end and budget-friendly options.
- Features of popular models include *self-emptying*, *smart navigation*, and mopping capabilities.
- Notable deals from brands like **Roborock**, **Dreame**, and **Eufy** cater to various cleaning needs and budgets.

items.title: Bluesky Rolls Out Age Verification in the UK
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
- *Bluesky* has implemented age verification in the *UK* to align with the Online Safety Act. 
- Users can verify ages via face scanning, ID uploads, or payment card entry; limited features will apply to unverified users. 
- Failure to comply with these regulations may result in significant fines for non-conforming platforms.

items.title: Apple Deals for Amazon Prime Day 2025
items.author: Sheena Vasani
items.summary:
- Steep discounts on *Apple products* including AirPods Pro and Apple Watch Series 10. 
- Prime Day offers significant savings across various devices, including the *iPad Air* and *MacBook Air*. 
-Non-Prime members can also access these deals, with prices reflecting all-time lows on many items.

items.title: The best Prime Day deals on charging accessories
items.author: Brandon Russell
items.summary:
- *Prime Day* offers significant discounts on various *charging accessories*. 
- Notable products include wall chargers, power banks, and charging stations from trusted brands like **Anker** and **Belkin**.
- Deals are available up to *55% off*, lasting until *July 11th* and updated regularly.

items.title: Hyundai Ioniq 6 N: A Performance EV Adventure
items.author: Andrew J. Hawkins
items.summary:
**Hyundai's Ioniq 6 N** debuted at the Goodwood Festival of Speed, featuring impressive enhancements:  
- The Ioniq 6 N delivers *641 horsepower* and a 0-62 mph time of just *3.2 seconds*.  
- It includes innovative features like *N e-Shift* for simulated gear changes and performance options to enhance the driving experience.  
- While pricing is not yet confirmed, it’s expected to be more affordable than rivals like the *Lucid Air Sapphire* and *Porsche Taycan*.

items.title: Murderbot Season 2 Announcement on Apple TV Plus
items.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
items.summary:
- *Murderbot Diaries*, based on Martha Wells' work, is getting renewed for a second season on Apple TV Plus.
- Co-creators Chris and Paul Weitz expressed gratitude for the positive reception ahead of the season 1 finale.
- The new season will continue *Murderbot's* adventures and explore *The Rise and Fall of Sanctuary Moon* further.

items.title: YouTube’s ‘Trending’ Section Disappearing
items.author: Jess Weatherbed
items.summary:
- YouTube is removing the *Trending section* in favor of expanding *YouTube Charts*, which will focus on top-performing content in various categories.
- This shift responds to the growing variety of *micro-trends* and multiple sources for viral videos, reducing the relevance of a singular trending list.
- Users and creators are being guided towards *personalized recommendations* and AI-generated content suggestions for better video discovery.

items.title: Hulu's King of the Hill Revival Trailer Revealed
items.author: Charles Pulliam-Moore
items.summary:
- The *revival* of **King of the Hill** shows a transformed Texas years after Hank's propane job in Saudi Arabia.
- Characters like Boomhauer and Dale return, facing a modern Arlen with gender-neutral bathrooms and gig economy workers.
- The series, premiering on August 4, will need to balance humor with heartfelt messages in this new *cultural landscape*.

items.title: Top Desk Accessories for Prime Day
items.author: Verge Staff
items.summary:
- The article showcases various *desk accessories* favored by Verge staff during *Amazon's Prime Day* sales. 
- Featured products include *Logitech G713 keyboard*, *Logitech G705 mouse*, and cord holders for organization. 
- Accessories prioritize both functionality and aesthetics to enhance the *workspace experience*.

items.title: Netflix Keeps Squid Game Reality Show Alive
items.author: Jay Peters
items.summary:
- Netflix announces *Squid Game: The Challenge* season 2 will debut on **November 4th**, with 456 new contestants competing for a *$4.56 million* prize.
- The show promises **higher stakes and shocking twists**, aimed to enhance viewer engagement.
- Casting for season 3 has begun, with priority given to winners of related real-life events in New York and London.

items.title: ModRetro Chromatic Game Boy Back in Stock
items.author: Andrew Liszewski
items.summary:
• The *Chromatic Game Boy* is now *permanently back in stock* with new color options and accessories.
• Pricing starts at *$199.99* for the standard model, with durability enhanced to *$299.99* for sapphire glass protection.
• ModRetro expands its games collection, introducing *five new cartridges* and a rechargeable battery for extended gameplay.

items.title: OpenAI's Next Big Launch: An AI Web Browser
items.author: Emma Roth
items.summary:
- OpenAI is set to launch an *AI web browser* within weeks, integrating its **Operator AI agent** for user tasks.
- The browser will feature a *native ChatGPT interface*, allowing direct interaction without visiting OpenAI's site.
- This development represents a potential challenge to Google Chrome, especially with *federal antitrust issues* looming over Google.

items.title: Meta's Struggle in the AI Talent War
items.author: Hayden Field
items.summary:
- Meta has ramped up efforts to recruit AI talent, offering **high compensation** packages up to $1.4 million annually.
- Despite significant financial incentives, many engineers prefer companies that align with their *values* and mission in AI.
- The intense competition and recent turmoil at OpenAI have made it easier for Meta to poach talent, although **loyalty** still remains paramount for many in the field.

items.title: Gemini AI can now turn photos into videos
